item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 13, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Debugging: Indispensable rules for finding even the most elusive problems (2004) (156 points | 69 comments)
2. Literate programming: Knuth is doing it wrong (2014) (67 points | 32 comments)
3. Luck Be a Landlord Might Be Banned from Google Play (64 points | 49 comments)
4. Show HN: New search engine and free-FOIA-by-fax-via-web for US veteran records (58 points | 24 comments)
5. Sonos CEO Patrick Spence steps down after disastrous app launch (37 points | 36 comments)
6. Celebrating the Timeless Allure of Tintin's Aesthetics (111 points | 43 comments)
7. Why is my CPU usage always 100%? (283 points | 66 comments)
8. Railroad Tycoon II (98 points | 28 comments)
9. Entropy of a Large Language Model output (36 points | 8 comments)
10. The Origins of Wokeness (28 points | 6 comments)
11. Raycast (YC W20) Is Hiring Full Stack Engineer (EU, Remote, €105k-€160k) ( | hide)
12. Live London Underground / bus maps taken down by TfL trademark complaint (81 points | 28 comments)
13. How did they make cars fall apart in old movies (2017) (179 points | 67 comments)
14. IRC Driven – modern IRC indexing site and search engine (73 points | 50 comments)
15. Bad Apple but it's 6,500 regexes that I search for in Vim (514 points | 51 comments)
16. Show HN: Werk, a simple build tool and command runner (22 points | 2 comments)
17. Standard patterns in choice-based games (2015) (191 points | 48 comments)
18. The history and use of /etc./glob in early Unixes (42 points | 20 comments)
19. Right to root access (240 points | 226 comments)
20. Euro-cloud provider Anexia moves 12,000 VMs off VMware to homebrew KVM platform (29 points | 3 comments)
21. The Free Movie: Frame-by-frame, handrawn reproduction of "The Bee Movie" (2023) (177 points | 48 comments)
22. Tabby: Self-hosted AI coding assistant (295 points | 114 comments)
23. Backdooring Your Backdoors – Another $20 Domain, More Governments (387 points | 49 comments)
24. Show HN: Doom (1993) in a PDF (289 points | 57 comments)
25. It's time to abandon the cargo cult metaphor (230 points | 486 comments)
26. How to miscompile programs with "benign" data races [pdf] (7 points | discuss)
27. If we had the best product engineering organization, what would it look like? (168 points | 92 comments)
28. Mac Mini G4 – The best « classic » Macintosh for retro-gaming? (217 points | 109 comments)
29. The Canva outage: another tale of saturation and resilience (143 points | 35 comments)
30. Young Persons Guide to BCPL Programming on the Raspberry Pi [pdf] (29 points | 20 comments)
